components.name: thinking-state
components.description: ThinkingState - A customizable, animated indicator for loading/thinking states with support for message cycling and completion states.

components.name: ai-feedback-collector
components.description: A flexible component for collecting user feedback on AI-generated content. Supports thumbs up/down reactions, optional comments, and custom styling.

components.name: feature-toggle
components.description: Feature Toggle - A sleek, modern toggle button for enabling/disabling AI features with an elegant glowing effect when active.
